subject: Prescription Request
text: Can I get a refill for my blood pressure medication?

subject: Prescription Request
text: Sure. I’ve sent the refill to your pharmacy.

subject: Appointment Request
text: I need to book a follow-up appointment for my knee pain.

subject: Appointment Request
text: Would next Monday at 10am work for you?

subject: Appointment Request
text: Yes, that works. Please confirm it.

subject: Symptom Reporting
text: I’ve been having headaches and dizziness lately.

subject: Symptom Reporting
text: Please monitor your blood pressure twice daily and log the readings.

subject: Lab Report Discussion
text: Your blood test results came back normal, except slightly elevated cholesterol.

subject: Lab Report Discussion
text: Thanks for the update. Do I need to change my diet?

subject: Lab Report Discussion
text: Yes. I recommend reducing saturated fats and increasing fiber intake.
